techmeme.title: A Google exec and sources say a ransomware group presumably tied to Cl0p is sending extortion emails, claiming it stole data from Oracle's E-Business Suite (Bloomberg)
Sources: Universal Music and Warner Music are nearing landmark AI licensing deals with companies including Google, ElevenLabs, Stability AI, Suno, and Udio (Anna Nicolaou/Financial Times)
London-based "neocloud" startup Nscale closed a $433M pre-Series C SAFE round from Nvidia, Nokia, Dell, and others, after raising a $1.1B Series B on Sept. 25 (John Reynolds/Tech.eu)
Data center real estate investment trust Fermi, co-founded by former US Energy Secretary Rick Perry, closed up 55% in its Nasdaq debut, valuing Fermi at ~$19.3B (Bloomberg)
China's recently launched K visa program hopes to attract foreign STEM graduates, but faces online backlash over fears of companies favoring overseas applicants (Anniek Bao/CNBC)
